typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{'No'} as string,
		{'SubjectID'} as string,
		{ 'Date confirmed'} as string,
		{ 'Appetite Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{'Eating habit Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'Preference Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'Sleep Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{'Anxiety about health Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'Anxiety about forgetfulness Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'I can go up and down stairs without being transmitted to the railing or wall'} as string,
		{ 'I can get up from the chair'} as string,
		{ 'I can walk for more than 15 minutes'} as string,
		{ 'I can walk without a cane'} as string,
		{ 'I am actively going out'} as string,
		{ 'Walking function Score'} as string,
		{ 'Walking function Evaluation'} as string,
		{ 'Do the cleaning and washing yourself'} as string,
		{ 'Shop for daily necessities yourself'} as string,
		{'I can prepare your own meals'} as string,
		{ 'I can write the documents to be submitted to the government office by myself'} as string,
		{ '自分で電話帳を調べ、電話をかけることができる'} as string,
		{ '生活機能 Score'} as string,
		{ '生活機能 Evaluation'} as string,
		{ 'I have a counselor in case of trouble'} as string,
		{ "I have a counselor when I'm sick"} as string,
		{ "I have someone who will take me to the hospital when I'm sick"} as string,
		{ 'There are people who take care of me when I fall asleep'} as string,
		{ 'Relying on someone'} as string,
		{ 'ソーシャルサポート Score'} as string,
		{ 'ソーシャルサポート Evaluation'} as string,
		{ 'No weight loss of more than 2-3 kg in the last 6 months'} as string,
		{ 'No weight gain of more than 2-3 kg in the last 2 months'} as string,
		{ 'I can eat hard food'} as string,
		{When I drink tea or soup, I don't get sick} as string,
		{I don't mind thirst} as string,
		{ '口腔・栄養 Score'} as string,
		{ '口腔・栄養 Evaluation'} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> li02
source(output(
		{'No'} as string,
		{'SubjectID'} as string,
		{ 'Health status'} as string,
		{ 'Biological function'} as string,
		{ 'Exercise function'} as string,
		{ 'Nutrition'} as string,
		{ 'Cognitive function'} as string,
		{ 'Fall'} as string,
		{ 'High blood pressure'} as string,
		{ 'Arrhythmia'} as string,
		{ 'Osteoporosis'} as string,
		{ 'Diabetes mellitus'} as string,
		{ 'Exercise guidance'} as string,
		{ 'Nutrition guidance'} as string,
		{'Life guidance'} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ev05
li02 select(mapColumn(
		{'SubjectID'},
		{ 'Appetite Questionnaire results'},
		{ 'Preference Questionnaire results'},
		{ 'Sleep Questionnaire results'},
		{'Anxiety about health Questionnaire results'},
		{ 'I can go up and down stairs without being transmitted to the railing or wall'},
		{ 'I can walk for more than 15 minutes'},
		{ 'I am actively going out'},
		{ 'Do the cleaning and washing yourself'},
		{ 'Shop for daily necessities yourself'},
		{ 'No weight loss of more than 2-3 kg in the last 6 months'},
		{ 'No weight gain of more than 2-3 kg in the last 2 months'}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
ev05 select(mapColumn(
		{'SubjectID'},
		{ 'Exercise function'},
		{ 'Nutrition'}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select1, Select2 join(Select1@{'SubjectID'} == Select2@{'SubjectID'},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> behavior
